name: Integer
short_description: Dropdown of integers in a set range.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties4.name: message
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as error on validation.

properties5.name: description
properties5.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties6.name: class
properties6.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field. If omitted this will default to 'text_area'.

properties7.name: required
properties7.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties8.name: validate
properties8.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

properties9.name: first
properties9.description: (mandatory) this value is the lowest on the list.

properties10.name: last
properties10.description: (mandatory) this value is the highest on the list.

properties11.name: step
properties11.description: (mandatory) each option will be the previous option incremented by this integer, starting with the first value until the last value is reached.

properties12.name: showon
properties12.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The integer form field type provides a select box with a range of integer values. If the field has a value saved, this value is displayed when the page is first loaded. If not, the default value (if any) is selected.
